LanguageData.Gun_TripleRocket.label: зтроєна рактниця
LanguageData.Gun_TripleRocket.description: A single-use rocket launcher that fires a cluster of three large-bore explosive rockets. Good against smalll groups of tough targets.\n\nBecause of its unwieldiness, single-use limitation, and the massive destruction it causes, it's said that one must be slightly crazy to use this weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_TripleRocket.tools.0.label: ствол
LanguageData.Bullet_Rocket.label: ракета
LanguageData.Gun_DoomsdayRocket.label: ракетниця для ракет судного дня
LanguageData.Gun_DoomsdayRocket.description: A single-use rocket launcher that fires a massive explosive projectile. Good against large groups of soft targets. Starts fires.\n\nBecause of its unwieldiness, single-use limitation, and the massive destruction it causes, it's said that one must be slightly crazy to use this weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_DoomsdayRocket.tools.0.label: ствол
LanguageData.Bullet_DoomsdayRocket.label: ракета судного дня
